title: Perform a Price Change
description: A category manager has decided to permanently lower the price of an item. A store associate needs to update the shelf label.

tasks.description: Receive a task to update the price for a specific item.
tasks.expected_outcome: The associate gets a notification of a required price change.

tasks.description: The new price has already been updated in the central system. The associate prints a new shelf label with the updated price.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new, accurate shelf label is printed.

tasks.description: Go to the item's location on the sales floor, remove the old label, and replace it with the new one.
tasks.expected_outcome: The price displayed to the customer on the shelf now matches the price in the POS system.
